title: So with Zoe's ability to use flash immediately after someone else...
body:
In a Zoe vs. Zoe matchup, could they both just flash endlessly in lane?

I need answers, Riot.

They'll likely tweak her abilities and make it more like Ahri's ult or some sort of cd like Tristana's jump.

Hence why i suggested it had a charge system involved (think akali and Corki R)

In the teaser she would have had to burn her own flash and use the flash she picked up from both the ADC and the Supp. Which is why i suggested that her summoner spell/item copy mechanic is most likely an R with a charge system. during that 2v1 zoe flashes (probably her own summ spell) then flashes again while grabbing the dash mechanic (the second flash occurs when the proto belt ball is entering a collection animation) she then uses proto belt, picks up a flash ball and then flashes for the third time again.

If it has a three charge system like I think it does then what occurred is definitely possible, especially since Zoe screams that she was built around Summoner Specialist

If zoe picks up a copy orb zoe's R then becomes a copy of that spell.
Her R is the wormhole ability. The summoner stealing is her Passive. She picks it up and has to use it within a short duration.

exactly why i think it's probably a spell and most likely her R ability.

Balls literally becoming inventory slots (which would be terrible design because her passive then forces her to not have one when she hits 5 items) I just can not see it being balanceable outside of anything but what I was suggesting. 6 item Zoe would have zero use for the ball drops because she wouldn't have inventory space.

Plus making her click a special button that appears on the hud to use the abilities seems like it would be a nightmare to use (would feel ultra clunky for anyone who plays the game with quick casts).

More than likely her R will read something along the lines of R : X seconds CD stacks up to 3 times - whenever Zoe uses a summoner spell or picks up a 'ball' her R becomes this item effect / summoner spell for x seconds.  while the R also having a passive ability of (enemy) champions now drop 'balls' when they use item effects or summoner spells. this ball when collected will then become the R ability. 

the passive that i think will be on R may be tied to her actual passive (which i think is the ahri fox fire bubble thing that happens whenever she uses a summoner spell or picks up a ball) but i think the ball spawning mechanism will most likely be tethered to her 6 so she gets that whole 'i have the power' moment when she dings while also reducing some of the potential damage she has in lane from the passive shoot the target when summoner spells are used thing

i dont think its her ult did you not see the portal thing with the sleep? that looks alot more like a ult then taking summoner spells also she is a burst mage i dont think a burst mage would have a summoner spell activator as her ult otherwise she would be more of a utility champ then a burst mage so if it does take up a skill slot it will probs be q w or e

the portal thing is probably something that functions similar to le blanc's dash + port, only it looks like its port + port and no damage, considering it was used to simply dodge an aurelion sol q and it was only shown once
 
the strongest part of the sleep ball looks to be its large cast range and probably its potential zoning ability. Considering Riot doesn't like really long forms of hard CC i seriously doubt this thing will be the ultimate ability. I 

my other reason for stating the copy ability being the ult with probably a charge system is because of how the 2v1 panned out

Zoe casts her sleep bubble then flashes (three bubbles appear around her) - there is a proto belt activation sitting on the ground - taric flashes leaving a ball where his flash takes him that looks almost like a sun(later looks like a randuin's omen). 

Jinx gets hit by the sleep bubble and a flash drops behind (further from zoe) the proto belt ball. Zoe walks into the proto belt ball and while the ball starts a neat looking collection animation she flashes again (the flash ball that appears from the sleep is still there) 

Zoe then pops the picked up proto belt ball which hurts jinx and maybe taric. Zoe then cast her bounce bubble behind her to pop taric. at this time Jinx starts to fall asleep and she pops cleanse and tries to snare the zoe with the zap ability. 

Jinx is standing in between the flash ball from her flash and above her is the cleanse ball. Taric gets dominated from the bounce bubble and the bubble fire. Zoe then walks up to the jinx collecting her flash bubble (and her hands turn a funny color) while a projectile fires from her towards jinx. Jinx casts her ult and zoe flashes for the third time in this mode.

Edit - the flash during the pick up jumps over a different orb
